quote: Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You're my only hope.
This is the weapon of a Jedi Knight. Not as clumsy or random as a blaster; an elegant weapon for a more civilized age.
Mos Eisley spaceport. You will never find a more wretched hive of scum and villainy.
I suggest a new strategy, Artoo
I find your lack of faith disturbing.
Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid.
That’s no moon. It's a space station.
Who's the more foolish? The fool or the fool who follows him?
You don’t need to see his identification. …These aren’t the droids you’re looking for.
It's the ship that made the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs.
Aren't you a little short for a stormtrooper?
I have a very bad feeling about this.
If you strike me down, I shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.
When I left you, I was but the learner. Now I am the master.
It's not impossible. I used to bullseye womp rats in my T-16 back home; they're not much bigger than two meters.
Use the Force, Luke.
Yes, Your Highnessness?
I thought they smelled bad on the outside!
Laugh it up, fuzzball.
Why, you stuck up, half-witted, scruffy-looking…nerf-herder!
Punch it!
Never tell me the odds.
Ah! A great warrior. Wars not make one great.
You like me because I'm a scoundrel. There aren't enough scoundrels in your life.
Adventure. Heh! Excitement. Heh! A Jedi craves not these things.
Do. Or do not. There is no try.
Luminous beings are we, not this crude matter.
If you only knew the power of the Dark Side. Obi-Wan never told you what happened to your father. Luke Skywalker
I love you. Han Solo
That boy is our last hope. Yoda
The Force is strong in my family. My father has it. I have it. My sister has it.
It's a trap!
Never. I'll never turn to the Dark Side. You've failed, Your Highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.
I'll not leave you here. I've got to save you. Anakin Skywalker
The ability to speak does not make you intelligent.
Master Yoda says I should be mindful of the future. Qui-Gon Jinn
Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering. I sense much fear in you.
There's always a bigger fish.
Your focus determines your reality.
Sometimes, we must let go of our pride, and do what is requested of us.
All mentors have a way of seeing more of our faults than we would like. It's the only way we grow.
To answer power with power, the Jedi way this is not. In this war, a danger there is, of losing who we are.
A great leap forward often requires first taking two steps back.
Senators, I presume you are acquainted with the collection of half-truths and hyperbole known as Obi-Wan Kenobi?
You don’t have to look tough to be tough.
No longer certain that one ever does win a war, I am.

All that surrounds us is the foundation of life. The birthplace of what your science calls 'midi-chlorians.' The foundation of what connects the living Force and the cosmic Force. When a living thing dies, all is renewed. Life passes from the living Force into the cosmic Force and becomes one with it. One powers the other. One is renewed by the other.
So this is how liberty dies...with thunderous applause.
Do it.
If you're not with me, then you're my enemy. Obi-Wan Kenobi
It's over Anakin, I have the high ground.
Hello there.
Why'd you tell me we're out of rations? Now I'm starving.
Understanding you does not mean that I agree with you.
It's ironic. Clones wanted names instead of numbers, yet now people are signing up to be given numbers.
Blind allegiance makes you a pawn. A real leader protects his squad.
Everything you've heard about me is true.
You need anything? L3
What should we drink to? Han Solo
Have you ever tried to disinvite a Wookie to anything? Not a good idea.
There are some things far more frightening than death.
If you define yourself by your power to take life, a desire to dominate, to possess, then you have nothing.
Battles leave scars...some you can't see.
To defeat an enemy, you must know them. Not simply their battle tactics, but their history, philosophy, art.
I'm one with the Force. The Force is with me.
You can stand to see the Imperial flag reign across the galaxy? Jyn Erso
Rebellions are built on hope.
I fear nothing. For all is as the Force wills it.
I can bring you in warm, or I can bring you in cold.
This is the Way.
Wherever I go, he goes.
I'm not leaving my fate up to chance.
Jabba ruled with fear. I intend to rule with respect.
Loyalty and solidarity are the Way.
You can only get so far without a tribe.
Get back up. Always get back up.
The Force, it's calling to you. Just let it in.

Heeded my words not, did you? Pass on what you have learned. Strength. Mastery. But weakness, folly, failure also. Yes, failure most of all. The greatest teacher, failure is. Luke, we are what they grow beyond. That is the true burden of all masters.
What do you see? Rey
We've passed on all we know. A thousand generations live in you now. But this is your fight.
I'm Rey. Woman
You didn't kill Anakin Skywalker. I did.
That’s what a reckoning sounds like.
You might as well wear a sign that says, 'I promise to disappoint you.'
I'd rather die trying to take them down than die giving them what they want.
I burn my life to make a sunrise that I know I’ll never see.
